justification: Acknowledges B’s conservative/zero-RB lean and playoff schedule, but misreads needs: trading a Tier 1 workhorse RB for a Tier 4 pocket QB (when B already has a pocket QB) and a deep-threat WR labeled as “steadier” clashes with B’s floor/possession preference and urgent need for wins. The offer doesn’t clearly improve B’s lineup now. Acceptance probability is overstated. Rationale is brief and overlooks roster context and role fits.
